fullText:
Dual Challenge

Epic Tier
Prerequisite: 21st level, fighter, Combat Challenge class feature
Benefit: Whenever you mark an enemy with Combat Challenge, you can mark one additional enemy adjacent to that enemy. This mark lasts until the end of your next turn.

Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 144.
name: Dual Challenge

benefit: Whenever you mark an enemy with Combat Challenge, you can mark one additional enemy adjacent to that enemy. This mark lasts until the end of your next turn.
